name: Exercises in Style
description:
When the game ends, then it really begins!
Explore a minimalist world full of mysteries and creative puzzles.

Features:

  • A decent amount of "think outside the box" content;
  • Enough secrets to keep your curiosity satisfied;
  • More geometrical shapes than you would have liked to see;
  • Expectations on the player: the main content of the game will not be handed in to you, you'll have to find it yourself;
  • The End is only the beginning.

We recommend to download the game for an optimal experience.
